room_title: Escape room "Pathogen" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Beat the Pathogen room with 2 people and 2 minutes to spare. The puzzles were good and Kevin did a great job running our game. Thanks for a fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Pathogen" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was such a fun outing for my friends and me!! Sam and William were fantastic and knew every bit of their rooms by heart. We did Pathogen and Heist and they did not disappoint. We all left feeling like we totally crushed it and had a ton of fun in the process. Thought provoking, engaging rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Pathogen" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Had an amazing time! I went this past weekend for my birthday. We chose the Pathogen room. It was so much fun! We can't wait to come back!

room_title: Escape room "Pathogen" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Kat, Katelyn, "special K"....thanks for helping us have a great first time "escape room" experience in the pathogen room!

room_title: Escape room "Pathogen" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: My wife and I came here and chose one of the easiest rooms to dip our toes in the water. The staff were fun and helpful, the room was really clever, and we both had a great time. An excellent experience.
